sections.general: vice-president data and marketing technology professional summary i help media companies succeed with digital products and customer experiences. my passion is helping people and organizations transform, grow, and thrive with a unique mix of strategy, marketing, product, and technology leadership. this expertise has been developed over twenty years spent building successful digital businesses and products - across the world.
